author: alva
title: Got Mine for Free
review:
I got this magnet when I visited Germany a month ago.
They have a promotion, so if you spend certain amounts, they will give you the magnet for free. Good thing that they do that, since I won't spend any money to get this magnet.
The look and feel of the magnet is too crude, too Made-in-China:P

The good side is you can put a real Lego logo in you fridge. But if you really want this magnet, please look at the real thing first, before you decide to buy it, since I don't think they worth any money.
